question: PROBLEM. A 100-km long, 3-phase, 50-Hz transmission line has following line constants: Resistance/phase/km = 0.1 $\Omega$ Reactance/phase/km = 0.5 $\Omega$ Susceptance/phase/km = $10 \times 10^{-6}$ S If the line supplies load of 20 MW at 0.9 p.f. lagging at 66 kV at the receiving end, calculate the regulation
